meanings.definition: Not able to be repeated or done again.
meanings.sent1: The magic trick was unrepeatable, leaving everyone amazed.
meanings.sent2: The sunset's beauty was unrepeatable, making it a special moment.
meanings.sent3: The unrepeatable dance move made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her unrepeatable kindness touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The unrepeatable melody lingered in his mind long after the concert.

meanings.definition: Unique and unable to be replicated.
meanings.sent1: The artist's unrepeatable style set him apart from others.
meanings.sent2: Her unrepeatable talent made her a star in the music industry.
meanings.sent3: The unrepeatable flavor of the dish surprised everyone at the table.
meanings.sent4: His unrepeatable success in the competition was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The unrepeatable view from the mountaintop took his breath away.
